    1: """
    2: Tests for Indexes backed by arbitrary ExtensionArrays.
    3: """
    4: import pandas as pd
    5: 
    6: 
    7: class BaseIndexTests:
    8:     """Tests for Index object backed by an ExtensionArray"""
    9: 
   10:     def test_index_from_array(self, data):
   11:         idx = pd.Index(data)
   12:         assert data.dtype == idx.dtype
   13: 
   14:     def test_index_from_listlike_with_dtype(self, data):
   15:         idx = pd.Index(data, dtype=data.dtype)
   16:         assert idx.dtype == data.dtype
   17: 
   18:         idx = pd.Index(list(data), dtype=data.dtype)
   19:         assert idx.dtype == data.dtype
